title: Account transfer
body: Hey guys I've ran into some problems. A few weeks ago i tried transferring my account from EUNE to EU West but instead of getting transferred my account got stuck with the message "Your account is in the process of transferring. Please try again in a few minutes." I've tried contacting Riot support but I've received no answer. Has anyone had a similar problem like this in the past and have some information on how to sort this out?

replies.body: I'd like to correct that i did make a ticket but while i was offline so i did not receive a ticket number

Aha, gotcha!  I did manually search but wasn't able to locate anything related.  No worries, you can still reach out to support by email via support@riotgames.com.  We'll reply back via the email address you reach out to us from!
Alright I've sent a message now i'll be waiting for a reply. Thanks!
Well that might be a problem as i could not create a ticket as i am unable to log into my account all the information i can provide is my nickname.
You account might be stuck in limbo, so to speak if it's been in that status for a bit.  Toss me your ticket number and I'll check on the status for ya!
